title: What should I do if the battery level is too low and I can't power my watch on?
answer:
If you cannot power your watch on because the battery level is too low, or the screen displays the charging icon but you cannot power the watch on and the watch gets hot, follow the steps below:

  • Check that the metal charging contacts on the back of the watch and the pins on the charging cradle are not damaged.
  • Ensure that there are no objects obstructing the connection between the watch and the charging cradle and that the metal contacts are not corroded. Check that the pins on the charging cradle are not bent and that they connect to the metal charging contacts properly.
faqType: User Requirements, Complaints, and Public Opinions
